CustomField.formula: if(CreatedDate=LastModifiedDate, TEXT(YEAR( datevalue(CreatedDate) )) & "Q" & TEXT(FLOOR(((MONTH(datevalue(CreatedDate))-1)/3)+1) ) & " Created Stories", TEXT(YEAR( datevalue(LastModifiedDate) )) & "Q" & TEXT(FLOOR(((MONTH(datevalue(LastModifiedDate))-1)/3)+1) ) & " Updated Stories")
CustomField.label: QTRMetrics
